nodes.text: The Battle of Wayfar was an armed conflict between the citizens of the town of Wayfar and a Tusken Raider warband on the planet Tatooine. A roving warband of Tuskens terrorized the Western Dune Sea, destroying settlements and stealing water. The survivors headed to Wayfar, where the town made a stand against the Tuskens in order to safeguard their water.
